context.p: On the Recover password page, you start the process for defining a new password for your user ID.

step.cmd: Enter the characters as visible in the Word verification area. Be aware that the characters are case-sensitive.
To start the process for defining a new password, click Continue.

result.p: You are sent an email with a URL for entering a new password. Click the URL provided in the email to define a new password and finish the recovery process.

p.note: If you do not receive this email, you have entered a wrong user ID. Note that you do not receive an error message when entering a wrong user ID. Check your user ID and try again with the correct one.
